    A class representing shared characteristics of animals.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animal

        public Animal(boolean randomAge,
              Field field,
              Location location)
        Create a new animal at location in field. An animal can have an initial age of zero or a random age.
        Parameters:
        randomAge - If true, the animal will have random age and hunger level.
        field - The field currently occupied.
        location - The location within the field.
